Posts.EditableText: Hi Dennis I think the Quest distribution still has v1.009 of my typelib packed with it.. Because it is continually being fixed, I always recommend that anyone who decides typelib would be useful to them contact me for the latest version I really don't expect Alex to re-pack Quest each time I tweak my lib! Al (MaDbRiT)
